thread.title: Rihanna and more stars react to Beyonce's exciting baby news - "Congratulations to you Beyonce and my big bro Jay!"
thread.title_full: Rihanna and more stars react to Beyonce's exciting baby news - "Congratulations to you Beyonce and my big bro Jay!"

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Rihanna and more stars react to Beyonce's exciting baby news - "Congratulations to you Beyonce and my big bro Jay!"
text:
Thank you for subscribing!   
Celebrities have been flocking to Twitter to congratulate Beyonce and Jay Z after they announced they were expecting. 
The 35-year-old singer took to social media Wednesday to reveal that her brood - which currently consists of five-year-old Blue Ivy Carter - will be expanding when she gives births to twins later this year. 
Posting a picture of herself displaying her baby bump, the superstar wrote: "We would like to share our love and happiness. 
"We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. - The Carters (sic)" 
Shortly after the happy news was announced, her showbiz pals took to social media to offer their well wishes. 
Leading the way was Rihanna, who said she was ecstatic to hear that there was another two Carters on the way. 
"So excited about this news!!!! Congratulations to you @beyonce and my big bro Jay!!!!" she wrote. 
Sports Illustrated model Chrissy Teigen also sent her love to Bey, joking that they're best friends. 
"But really. Congrats to my best friend Beyonce I love you so much. Hive forever." 
"Congratulations to @Beyonce and the entire Knowles Carter family," Laverne Cox tweeted. 
While Rita Ora, who was once widely thought to be 'Becky with the good hair', wrote: "Yay Congratulations!!!! S beautiful " 
Unsurprisingly, Bey's mum Tina Lawson couldn't contiain her excitement either. https://www.instagram.com/p/BP-scFvDCB8/?taken-by=mstinalawson&hl=en/embed 
Sharing Beyonce's photo, Tina wrote: "WOW I don't have to keep the secret anymore I am soooo happy God is so good twin blessings". 
Beyonce and Jay Z - who have remained defiantly strong despite rumours surrounding their marriage - tied the knot in 2008. Beyonce and Blue in the park on Instagram (Photo: Beyonce/Instagram) Beyonce shares Halloween images with fans on Instagram. Jay Z, Ivy Blue (Photo: Instagram) Singer Beyonce Knowles and daughter Blue Ivy Carter (Photo: Getty) 
Four years later, they welcomed their daughter Blue Ivy Carter into the world. 
The two new arrivals could already have a BFF set for life when they are welcomed to the world, after Bey's Destiny's Child bandmate Kelly Rowland revealed their kids are already great friends . 
Speaking to E! News, she said: "Yes, they are extremely close. It's the sweetest thing. It's the greatest thing about friendship when you're able to grow up together and your children are able to grow up together and it's just years."
